effect_entries.effect:
Used on a patch of soil
:   Plant’s growth stages will each last 25% more time.  Dries soil out more slowly.
effect_entries.short_effect: Growing time of berries is increased, but the soil dries out slower.

flavor_text_entries.text: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.
